summary: A resourceful American orphan living in rural Australia finds himself caught up in the magic of a local Aboriginal myth that might be more real than anyone knows.
cast: Henry Thomas|Tony Barry|Rachel Friend|Tamsin West|Dempsey Knight|John Ewart|Chris Gregory|Mark Knight|Dennis Miller|Katy Manning|Laurie Dobson|Jay Mannering|Tim Hughes|Howard Eynon|David Ravenswood|Peter Cummins|Amanda Fernbach|Marcus Eyre|Glen Hunt|Kevin King|Vince Quayle|El Prezzos|Hugh Bryant|Renae Carol|Laura Christie
title: El secreto del lago
